name: Advance Wars: Dual Strike
description:
On the heels of its last defeat, the nefarious Black Hole Army has
fallen under the control of a deadly new commanding officer. He has sent
its new COs to attack the nations of Wars World once again, and it’s up
to the allied armies of Orange Star, Blue Moon, Yellow Comet and Green
Earth to put an end to Black Hole once and for all. Players lead their
new Commanding Officers to fend off the Black Hole Army’s latest
invasion. With massive battles that sweep across both screens, Advance
Wars: Dual Strike will change the face of Dual-Screen warfare forever.
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.

Idiomas

Inglés, Español, Francés, Alemán, Italiano
